summary:
Adds bound versions of utility tools so you don\'t have to haul them around. Uses modified in game art.

Contains:
- Bound Pickaxe
- Bound Woodcutter\'s Axe
descriptionHtml:
Adds bound versions of utility tools so you don\'t have to haul them around. Uses modified in game art.

Contains:
- Bound Pickaxe
- Bound Woodcutter\'s Axe

Spell tomes can be found in Dragonsreach near Farengar.

*** This mod will conflict with the following mods. You can have more than one mod enabled, but only one of the added methods will be able to \"mine\" ore.
- Mining Flames
- Midas Magic\'s Bound Pickaxe spell

Please comment with any questions, feedback, requests, or bug reports!
author: Vonwarr
